---
title: "Article 3: Password generator"
---

```{=html}
<style>
    #password-generator-container {
            font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
            text-align: center;
            margin: 50px;
        }

        #password-generator-container h1 {
            color: #333;
        }

        #password-generator-container div {
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        #password-generator-container label {
            display: block;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
            font-size: 1.2em;
        }

        #password-generator-container input {
            padding: 8px;
            font-size: 1em;
        }

        #password-generator-container button {
            padding: 10px;
            font-size: 1em;
            cursor: pointer;
            background-color: #4CAF50;
            color: white;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 4px;
        }

        #password-generator-container button:hover {
            background-color: #45a049;
        }

        #password-generator-container #password {
            font-size: 1.5em;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
</style>

<body>
  <div id="password-generator-container">
      <h1>Password Generator</h1>
      <div>
          <label for="length">Password Length:</label>
          <input type="number" id="length" value="12" min="1" max="1000">
      </div>

        <h1>Include Special Characters</h1>
        <form>
            <input type="radio" id="special" name = "includeSpecial" value = "yes"
            <label for="special">Yes</label><br>
            <input type="radio" id="special" name = "includeSpecial" value = "no"
            <label for="special">No</label><br>
        </form>

        <h1>Include uppercase letters</h1>
        <form>
            <input type="radio" id="uppercase" name = "includeUpper" value = "yes"
            <label for="special">Yes</label><br>
            <input type="radio" id="uppercase" name = "includeUpper" value = "no"
            <label for="special">No</label><br>
        </form>

        <h1>Include numbers</h1>
        <form>
            <input type="radio" id="number" name = "includeNumbers" value = "yes"
            <label for="special">Yes</label><br>
            <input type="radio" id="special" name = "includeNumbers" value = "no"
            <label for="special">No</label><br>
        </form>

      <button onclick="generatePassword()">Generate Password</button>
      <div id="password"></div>
  </div>

  <script src="script.js"></script>
</body>
```
